experience.title: Co-Founder | Brand Development | F&B | Retail Strategy | Market Expansion
experience.description: As Co-founder of Gaston Brands Corp, I lead the strategic direction and growth of an innovative F&B company that specializes in advising, investing in, and developing food and beverage brands. Our portfolio includes successful investments in both international and local brands, such as Es Teh (600+ stores), Foresthree (100+ stores), Raindeer Coffee and other brands with a total of 800+ outlets. I oversee brand development, franchise expansion, and marketing strategies, driving significant market presence and operational excellence across our ventures.

I oversee brand development, franchise expansion, and marketing strategies, driving significant market presence and operational excellence across our ventures.

experience.title: Co-founder & Project Director
experience.description: Manage the supply chain and distribution of premium Moroccan argan oil for both B2B and B2C markets.
